qas.question: What Foundation wanted to aid Beijing?
When did Beijing agree to aid from Taiwan?
What was the first group from outside China to join in the relief operation?
What did China say they would accept?
What did China need help for?

context: Beijing accepted the aid of <a0_0>the <a3_0>Tzu Chi Foundation<a3_0/><a0_0/> from <a1_0>Taiwan<a1_0/> <a2_0>late on May 13<a2_0/>. China stated it would gratefully accept <a4_0>international help<a4_0/> to <a5_0>cope with the quake<a5_0/>.
